tasks.label: A0 CLEAN SOURCE
tasks.command: cd xdcc/egress_xdcc; rm -rf annotated partitioned divvied refactored *working *.json;

tasks.label: A1 ANNOTATE
tasks.command: cd xdcc/egress_xdcc; mkdir annotated; cp -R xdcc_autogen/* annotated; echo Prepared sources for CLE annotation by developer under ./annotated; echo Move to Conflict Analysis when done annotating

tasks.label: A2 ANALYZE PARTITION CONFLICTS
tasks.command: cd xdcc/egress_xdcc; source .vscode/closure_env.sh; make -f .vscode/Makefile.conflicts dot && make -f .vscode/Makefile.conflicts enclaves && mkdir -p ./refactored  && make -f .vscode/Makefile.conflicts clean && cp -r ./annotated/* ./refactored

tasks.label: A3 AUTOMAGIC
dependsOn: A9b AUTOGEN GEDL, RPCs, IDL, Codecs

tasks.label: A9b AUTOGEN GEDL, RPCs, IDL, Codecs
tasks.command: cd xdcc/egress_xdcc; source .vscode/closure_env.sh && mkdir -p partitioned && cp -r /opt/closure/heuristics ./partitioned && make -f .vscode/Makefile.gedl gedl && make -f .vscode/Makefile.gedl rautogen && make -f .vscode/Makefile.gedl rpc

tasks.label: A9d VISUALIZE CROSS-DOMAIN CUT
tasks.command: cd xdcc/egress_xdcc; source .vscode/closure_env.sh; bash .vscode/cutzoom.sh; xdot -f fdp partitioned/multithreaded/abridged_1_colored.dot

tasks.label: A9e BUILD
tasks.command: cd xdcc/egress_xdcc; source .vscode/closure_env.sh; cd ../xdcc_echo && cp ../egress_xdcc/.vscode/Makefile.xdcc_echo ./Makefile && make && cd ../egress_xdcc; make -C partitioned/multithreaded/orange -f ../../../.vscode/Makefile.xdcc; make -C partitioned/multithreaded/green -f ../../../.vscode/Makefile.xdcc
